revised_title: Scattering of Scalar Waves by Semi-Infinite Rods: A Review
tldr: This article explores the scattering of scalar waves by semi-infinite rods of circular cross-section, focusing on the boundary conditions and their effects on the scattered field. The author examines the distant field, average pressure amplitude, and scattering coefficient for different angles of incidence and boundary conditions, providing valuable insights into the behavior of waves interacting with cylindrical obstacles.
